title: Delicate Gold Chain with Diamond Accents
materials: 22K Gold (G.wt: 1.120) with Brilliant Cut Diamonds (D.wt: 0.56 ct
40 stones). Features a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and lasting shine.
features: A finely crafted gold chain with a wheat link design. Features three equidistant diamond-studded rondelle spacers adding a touch of understated elegance. The minimalist design showcases the brilliance of the diamonds against the warm gold.
colors: Predominantly warm yellow gold with the brilliant white sparkle of diamonds.
occasions: Suitable for everyday wear or layering with traditional pendants. Ideal for casual gatherings
description: A timeless piece offering subtle sophistication and versatility. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable for daily wear. The diamond accents add a touch of luxury while maintaining a minimalist aesthetic. Perfect for those seeking a modern interpretation of classic gold jewelry.
